  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/959</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/959</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura: amores y seductores</string>
            <string language="en">Literature: love and seduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur: Liebe und seduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature : amour et séduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura: amor e seduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura: amore e seduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία: αγάπη και αποπλάνηση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta el teatre de tema amorós i grans personatges seductors, com Don Juan o Romeo, i també seductores, com la Celestina. Lectura de fragments de "La Celestina", "El perro del hortelano" y "Don Juan Tenorio". S'estudia el llenguatge teatral (acotacions, diàleg, etc.). Hi ha activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on plays about love and great seducers such as Don Juan and Romeo, as well as Celestina. Sample texts from "La Celestina", "The Dog in the Manger", and "Don Juan Tenorio". It studies the language of the theatre (stage directions, dialogue, etc.) Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història de la literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia de la literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">text literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary text</string>
            <string language="es">texto literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">obra literària</string>
            <string language="en">literary work</string>
            <string language="es">obra literaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">teatre</string>
            <string language="en">theatre</string>
            <string language="es">teatro</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel auf Spielen über Liebe 
und großen seducers wie zieht Juan und Romeo, sowie Celestina an. 
Prüfen Sie Texte "vom La Celestina", "der Hund in der Krippe", 
und "ziehen Sie Juan Tenorio" an. Es studiert die Sprache des 
Theaters (Stadium Richtungen, Dialog, usw..) Selbstbewertung 
Aktivitäten sind auch für Praxis eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La ressource interactive sur des jeux au sujet de 
l'amour et de grands séducteurs comme met Juan et Romeo, aussi 
bien que Celestina. Échantillonnez les textes de la "La 
Celestina", "le chien dans Manger", et "mettez Juan 
Tenorio". Il étudie le langage du théâtre (directions 
d'étape, dialogue, etc...) Des activités de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également incluses pour la pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O recurso interativo em jogos sobre o amor e em 
seducers grandes como don Juan e Romeo, as.well.as Celestina. 
Prove textos do "la Celestina", "o cão no manger", e "don Juan 
Tenorio". Estuda a língua do theatre (sentidos do estágio, 
diálogo, etc..) As atividades do self-assessment são 
incluídas também para a prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La risorsa interattiva sui giochi circa amore e 
sui seducers grandi come indossa Juan e Romeo, così come Celestina. 
Provi i testi "da La Celestina", "il cane nel manger" e "indossi
Juan Tenorio". Studia il linguaggio del teatro (sensi della 
fase, dialogo, ecc.) Le attività di valutazione di se stesso 
egualmente sono incluse per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στα παιχνίδια για την 
αγάπη και τους μεγάλους γόες όπως Don Juan και Romeo, 
καθώς επίσης και Celestina. Τα κείμενα δείγματα από "το 
Λα Celestina", "το σκυλί στη φάτνη", και "φορούν Juan 
Tenorio". Μελετά τη γλώσσα του θεάτρου (σκηνικές 
κατευθύνσεις, διαλογικό παράθυρο, κ.λπ....) Οι 
δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την 
πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarisches Genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarische Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarischer Text</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarische Arbeit</string>
          </keyword>
